overview:
Mr. Iturbe is an accomplished results-driven multi-faceted professional who has a considerable background as a senior system administrator, project manager, infrastructure architect, investor and entrepreneur. As a strong team builder with expertise in efficiently coordinating resources, developing cost-saving solutions and handling strategic planning, brand cultivation and business execution, he excels at creating dynamic environments that focus on fostering success. Currently, Mr. Iturbe the CEO for Novusport, Inc.

Quote from Iturbe ” Our vision is to bring a new, innovative form of sports participation and interaction into the Internet social media spectrum and become THE new sports pastime by fusing new technology with global sports reciprocity.

Our mission is great and our vision grand.

Our mobile App will allow our users to upload videos which validate the completion of a predefined sports drill. Each activity, when completed by the users and validated via video, populates and boosts his/her sports graph based on 10 physical attributes: Ground Speed, Water Speed, Endurance, Strength, Vertical Jump, Accuracy, Courage, Balance, Novusport IQ and Popularity.”
